languages.text: During each round, the first Psyker ability the Overseer retargets via the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} Psyber-Raven restores 1 AP after use.

traits.locale_text: During each round, the first Psyker ability the Overseer retargets via the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} Psyber-Raven restores 1 AP after use.

languages.text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} through the psyber-raven for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}relaying{/g} psyber-raven channels the first psychic power in a round, their Overseer regains +1 AP.

languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} through the psyber-raven for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, bir rauntta ilk kez ruhsiber kuzgun aracılığıyla ruhsezi gücü {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} +1 EP kazanır.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez ruhsiber kuzgun aracılığıyla ruhsezi gücü {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} +1 EP kazanır.

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} a través del psicocuervo por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, recupera +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} through the psyber-raven for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el supervisor {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un poder psíquico a través del psicocuervo por primera vez en un asalto, recupera +1 PA.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次通过生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，恢复1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} through the psyber-raven for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当监察官每轮中首次通过生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}灵能能力时，恢复1点行动点数。

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} durch den Psitech-Raben {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}überträgt{/g}, erhält er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} through the psyber-raven for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Aufseher zum ersten Mal in einer Runde psionische Kräfte durch den Psitech-Raben {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}überträgt{/g}, erhält er +1 AP zurück.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} via sa psyber-corneille pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il récupère +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} through the psyber-raven for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le surveillant {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} un pouvoir psychique via sa psyber-corneille pour la première fois au cours d'un round, il récupère +1 PA.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めてサイバーレイヴンを通して{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}場合、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+1回復する。

traits.locale_text: {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}Ретранслировав{/g} психосилу через псайберворона впервые за раунд, надзиратель восстанавливает 1 ОД.
